column4: Quick question:  just made a USB-Ubunutu9.10 installer, but I'm wondering if it's actually FOR installing, or is it meant to BOOT from the usb every time?
jmad - good, that's what i wanted.
Cause all of the guides say "now you can boot ubuntu from your usb whenever" etc..
it's a live usb.  you can install from it or you can use it as a portable computer
